questions.question: I hate …………………………… to wait for people who are always late.
questions.description: Either the infinitive or the gerund is possible here.

questions.question: Could you tell me why you delayed ………………………….. the money?
questions.description: Delay is usually followed by an ing form.

questions.question: The doctor asked him to give up …………………………
questions.description: Give up is usually followed by an ing form.

questions.question: They told us …………………………..
questions.description: Tell is followed by a to-infinitive.

questions.question: I dislike people ……………………….. me what to do.
questions.description: Dislike is usually followed by an ing form.

questions.question: I felt like …………………………. but I didn’t dare to.
questions.description: Feel like is usually followed by an ing form.

questions.question: I can’t help …………………………. his courage.
questions.description: Can't help is followed by an ing form.

questions.question: We can’t risk …………………………. any more lives.
questions.description: Risk is usually followed by an ing form.

questions.question: I tried to stop him from …………………………..
questions.description: Stop is followed by from + ing form.

questions.question: We could not restrain him from …………………………..
questions.description: Restrain is followed by object + from + ing form.

questions.question: My parents always motivated me .................................. big.
questions.description: Motivate is followed by an infinitive.
